name: Gp user Login With EMail-ID
author: Ganesh Paygude

sections.description:
Allow user to login with their Email ID OR Username.

Major features in Gp user Login With EMail-ID include:

  • Setting option checkbox allow to Login with Email ID associated with the user account.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is it secure?

Yes, and depending on your setup, it can be much more secure than just using WordPress usernames and passwords.

What are the system requirements?

PHP 5.2.x or higher with JSON extensions
WordPress 3.5 or above

Is it compatible with WordPress MultiSite?

Yes

Is it compatible with BuddyPress?

Yes

Will update this in next verion.
